channel.title: +1 Forward - Hogwart's
channel.description:
It's a new episode of +1 Forward - Hogwart's! https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/hogwarts
@Teddog chats with David Brunell-Brutman about his Harry Potter-themed RPG, and a bit about mysteries and fanfiction!
**Timecodes** 03:18 - Read a Sitch on running mysteries in PbtA 14:08 - Open Your Brain to Hogwarts 27:02 - Act Under Fire with Curtis 45:34 - A peek at the Mystery system in action
Check out the game and download it FREE here: https://www.hwrpg.net/
David's Patreon to support the development of future tabletop RPG projects. He's also begun designing his next (PbtA) game, *Teens with Attitude* . Find out about that, and support him here: https://www.patreon.com/davidbrunellbrutman
